description:
When I'm not driving maritime transformation⚓ and ocean sustainability 🐬, you can find me running 🏃🏼 making 🛠️ baking 🥖 sailing ⛵ or helping people find their own calling 🌟

  • Training or racing marathons and half-marathons in SW London.

  • Making, woodworking or coding Arduino at London Hackspace.

  • Baking bread or cooking food in my kitchen.

  • Sailing a Contessa 32 in the Solent or my Streaker 1404 on the Thames.

  • Teaching the four pillars of Health 💓 Freedom 🙌 Purpose 🎯 and Creation 🖌️

👇👇👇
cta: Subscribe to my channels and comment on my posts, I want to hear from you!!!
